text: Tini balalena -- “he adama! E-sabera namabali edera kache barnana kara.” Ta'i se yakhana tadera kache e-sabera namabali barnana karala, tini balalena -- “ami ki tomadera bali ni ye ami niscaya'i mahakasamandali o prthibira rahasyasaba jani? Ara ami jani ya tomara prakasa karecha, ara ya tomara lukiye rekhe calecha.”
